entry.title: Balloon Mini Model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mini Model
Type: Terrarium Decoration
Price: 9.95

Get away from it all with this tiny hot air balloon - one of eleven designs in the range of Mini Models.

Each pack contains one brass model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 30 x 34 x 38mm
Packaging Dimensions: 12.5 x 17.5cm
Product Weight: 10g

entry.title: Submarine Mini Model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mini Model
Type: Model Kits
Price: 10.50

Own your own tiny submarine with this miniature model kit. Packed flat, it's an easy to post gift for any nautical lover.

Each pack contains one brass flat pack model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers will be helpful.

This tiny object of desire is one of eleven designs in the range of mini-onaires.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 48 x 24 x 34mm
Packaging Dimensions: 10.5 x 10.5cm
Product Weight: 10g

entry.title: Boat Mini Model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mini Model
Type: Model Kits
Price: 10.50

Set sail on the Seven Seas with our Minimodel boat! Our little Ship doesn’t float so you won’t get suck in the Doldrums. Place your boat on a windowsill and watch her sail the skies. Pirate flag not included.


Pair with our MINImodel submarine for the full Nautical experience.
Instructions included, simply fold the metal into shape, gently bend the sails for the impression of a windy sea. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.


Contents: 1x brass coated model - 40 x 18 x 54mm  

Packaging: 100% recycled FSC paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 105 x 105mm

Type: Model Kits
Price: 10.50

A house you can finally afford! This miniature house model is a fun lightweight gift to send in the post. Perfect to decorate a plant or terrarium. 

Each pack contains one flat-pack brass model with step-by-step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 24 x 20 x 27mm
Packaging Dimensions: 10.5 x 10.5cm
Product Weight: 10g

entry.title: Bauhaus Design stencil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Stencils
Type: Stationery
Price: 12.75

Create stylish modernist graphics using this Bauhaus inspired drawing template.

The Bauhaus was a German Art school which unified fine art, craft and technology. Founded by architect Walter Gropius 1919 it has been, and continues to have a major impact on art trends around the world.

The Bauhaus style is a landmark of modernism, characterised by simplified forms, geometric abstraction and minimal embellishment.

Contents: Design Stencil, instructions, pattern suggestions
Materials: Brass, paper
Product Dimensions: 80mm x 195mm
Packaging Dimensions: 148mm x 210

entry.title: Art Nouveau Design Stencil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Stencils
Type: Stationery
Price: 12.75

Create beautiful stationery with this Art Nouveau inspired drawing template. Stencil the motifs to create bespoke invitations and greeting cards or decorate envelopes, gift wrap or letterheads.

The style is characterised by undulating lines, curvaceous motifs, asymmetrical shapes and harmonising forms.

Contents: Design Stencil, instructions, pattern suggestions
Materials: Brass, paper
Product Dimensions: 80mm x 195mm
Packaging Dimensions: 148mm x 210mm

entry.title: Art Deco Design Stencil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Stationery
Price: 12.75

Create your own stylish invitations, greeting cards and stationery using this 1920s inspired drawing template. Use the stencil to draw bold geometric patterns; design invitations and greeting cards, decorate envelopes or fashion some trendy gift wrap.

This dynamic artistic style is characterised by bold geometric forms, symmetrical patterns, contrasting colours and lavish ornamentation.

Contents: Brass Design Stencil, with instructions, including pattern ideas
Product Dimensions: 20 x 8.5 cm
Packaging Dimensions: 22.5 x 16 cm

entry.title: Tiny Trophies - Utterly Gorgeous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Fun Gifts
Price: 2.25

Tiny Trophies are the perfect excuse for you to celebrate the people in your life - family, friends, a colleague - and share what they mean to you. Fun and playful, these miniature brass awards are a great gift to highlight a person’s qualities and let slip what you admire and love about them the most.

Each Tiny Trophy is easy to assemble, the base of the trophy simply folding to stand upright. Lightweight and packed flat, these cute, little awards are easy gifts to send in the post.

Contents: Tiny Trophy
Materials: Paper, Brass
Packaging Dimensions: 52mm x 148mm
Product Dimensions: 45 x 25 x 10mm

entry.title: MONUmini Battersea Power Station
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 8.25

MONUmini is an iconic architectural model of Battersea Power Station; an immense building covering some 160m x 170m.

The kit includes a sheet of etched stainless steel pieces, which fold and lock together to create the miniature structure. It also includes step-by-step assembly instructions and a short building history all packed into an envelope making them a great, easy-to-post, souvenir. 

This is not a toy - the product contains sharp edges and is not suitable for young children.

Contents: metal model, instructions, building history
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 100 x 80 x 60mm
Packaging Dimensions: 165 x 230mm

entry.title: MONUmini Tower Bridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 8.25

MONUmini is an architectural model kit; a perfect memento or a fun gift for any design enthusiast or architect.

The kit includes a sheet of etched stainless steel pieces, which fold and lock together to create the miniature structure. It also includes step-by-step assembly instructions and a short building history all packed into an envelope making them a great, easy-to-post, souvenir.

Constructed in 1890's, Tower Bridge is a combined bascule and suspension bridge over the River Thames in London.

This is not a toy - the product contains sharp edges and is not suitable for children.

Contents: metal model, instructions, building history
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 170 x 40 x 50mm
Packaging Dimensions: 165 x 230mm
